title: Murray 6-4 Pospisil
description: Murray and Pospisil both hold serve for the rest of the set and Murray takes it 6-4

title: Murray 7-5 Pospisil
description: Murray finally breaks Pospisil in the last game of the set

title: Murray 5-4 Pospisil
description: Murray cracks a backhand left to right to break Posposil and serve for the match

title: Murray 6-4 Pospisil
description: Murray takes the match to earn his place in the semi finals
